excerpt.rendered:
❣ Our first ever sticker book!! ❣

Are you a person who loves collecting (hoarding??) stickers, but don’t enjoy having a pile of loose stickers just laying around? Restore just a little bit of order in this chaotic world, with these sticker books! The pages are made of sticker backing, so they can be peeled out of the book at any time, and placed on its forever home ☻

Cover art by the one and only Wokeface ♡

[Please note we do not produce custom cover sticker books!]

Dimensions: 6 x 8.25″

50 pages, front and back

This item ships free with orders over $50!
